      • getOptionConfiguration

        public java.util.List<Option<?>> getOptionConfiguration(@Nullable
                                               java.util.List<Option<?>> list)
        Description copied from interface: IOptionConfigurable
        Returns a list of Option objects describing the configurable settings of this object.

        Specified by:
        getOptionConfiguration in interface IOptionConfigurable
        Overrides:
        getOptionConfiguration in class NormalProposalKernel
        Parameters:
        list - if non-null, options should be appended to this list. Otherwise a new list will be created.
        Returns:
        list if non-null, otherwise returns a newly constructed mutable list containing option objects that describe the settings of this object that can be controlled by options. May return null if no options pertain to this object (but only if list was null!).

      • configureFromOptions

        public void configureFromOptions(IOptionHolder optionHolder)
        Configures state/parameters of object from option values obtained through given option holder.

        Sets standard deviation from corresponding option value.

        Sets standard deviation from corresponding NormalProposalKernel.standardDeviation option value, and sets lower and upper bounds from lowerBound and upperBound options.

        Specified by:
        configureFromOptions in interface IOptionConfigurable
        Overrides:
        configureFromOptions in class NormalProposalKernel
        Parameters:
        optionHolder - is the option holder that can be used to look up option settings.

        Since:
        0.07
